title: Pytorch 0.1.11 on Linux x64, CUDA 8.0, Conda doesn't load
body_html:
I having the following issue on import:

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "./xxx", line 14, in <module>
    import torch
  File "/home/speluchetti/conda3/envs/py3env/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/__init__.py", line 53, in <module>
    from torch._C import *
ImportError: /home/speluchetti/conda3/envs/py3env/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/_C.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so: undefined symbol: PySlice_AdjustIndices

System info:

python -V
Python 3.6.0 :: Continuum Analytics, Inc.

conda -V
conda 4.3.11

uname -a
Linux xxx 4.4.0-67-generic #88-Ubuntu SMP Wed Mar 8 16:34:45 UTC 2017 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux

CUDA Driver Version: 375.39

pytorch: 0.1.11-py36_3cu80 soumith [cuda80]

I think this is the same issue mentioned here:
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/43104252/undefined-symbol-pyslice-adjustindices-when-importing-pytorch

body:
I having the following issue on import:

```
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "./xxx", line 14, in <module>
    import torch
  File "/home/speluchetti/conda3/envs/py3env/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/__init__.py", line 53, in <module>
    from torch._C import *
ImportError: /home/speluchetti/conda3/envs/py3env/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/_C.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so: undefined symbol: PySlice_AdjustIndices
```

System info:

```
python -V
Python 3.6.0 :: Continuum Analytics, Inc.

conda -V
conda 4.3.11

uname -a
Linux xxx 4.4.0-67-generic #88-Ubuntu SMP Wed Mar 8 16:34:45 UTC 2017 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux

CUDA Driver Version: 375.39

pytorch: 0.1.11-py36_3cu80 soumith [cuda80]
```

I think this is the same issue mentioned here:
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/43104252/undefined-symbol-pyslice-adjustindices-when-importing-pytorch
